document.full_text: the obama administration is pushing back on wall street lobbyists and republican lawmakers, using the treasury department's no. 2 official to rebut "critics and naysayers" of new financial regulation.
document.title: treasury takes on wall street lobbyists
lines_and_colors: the obama administration is pushing back on wall street lobbyists and republican lawmakers, using the treasury department's no. 2 official to rebut "critics and naysayers" of new financial regulation.
